subtitleNullable: All DICOMs processed and exported to JPG
descriptionNullable:
**SIIM-Covid JPG 512 (processed)**

This is a dataset of JPG images exported from the SIIM-FISABIO COVID-19 Challenge dataset. This dataset does not contain updated BB info, so it should only be used for classification. If you want to maintain the BB info, have a look at my notebooks below.

There is one JPG for each DICOM image in the SIIM set. Some filters were applied to make the images more consistent across the set.

Images are 512 max width/height and are not distorted.

- Unsharp mask
- Histogram equalization
- Cropping

Here's the notebook I made it with -> https://www.kaggle.com/davidbroberts/export-processed-jpg-512
This notebook explains the techniques a little more -> https://www.kaggle.com/davidbroberts/standardizing-cxr-datasets
This notebook shows how to keep BB info when cropping -> https://www.kaggle.com/davidbroberts/bounding-boxes-on-cropped-images
